mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.shetuan_uuid_unmber as shetuanUuidUnmber ,a.shetuan_name as shetuanName ,a.shetuan_types as shetuanTypes ,a.shetuan_photo as shetuanPhoto ,a.tuanzhang_id as tuanzhangId ,a.shetuan_address as shetuanAddress ,a.shetuan_content as shetuanContent ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段 ,tuanzhang.tuanzhang_name as tuanzhangName ,tuanzhang.tuanzhang_photo as tuanzhangPhoto ,tuanzhang.tuanzhang_phone as tuanzhangPhone ,tuanzhang.tuanzhang_id_number as tuanzhangIdNumber ,tuanzhang.tuanzhang_email as tuanzhangEmail ,tuanzhang.tuanzhang_delete as tuanzhangDelete
FROM shetuan a left JOIN tuanzhang tuanzhang ON a.tuanzhang_id = tuanzhang.id
and a.id in
#{item}
and a.shetuan_uuid_unmber like CONCAT('%',#{params.shetuanUuidUnmber},'%')
and a.shetuan_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.shetuanName},'%')
and a.shetuan_types = #{params.shetuanTypes}
and ( a.tuanzhang_id = #{params.tuanzhangId} )
and a.shetuan_address like CONCAT('%',#{params.shetuanAddress},'%')
and a.shetuan_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.shetuanContent},'%')
and a.tuanzhang_id IS NOT NULL
and tuanzhang.tuanzhang_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.tuanzhangName},'%')
and tuanzhang.tuanzhang_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.tuanzhangPhone},'%')
and tuanzhang.tuanzhang_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.tuanzhangIdNumber},'%')
and tuanzhang.tuanzhang_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.tuanzhangEmail},'%')
and tuanzhang.tuanzhang_delete >= #{params.tuanzhangDeleteStart}
and tuanzhang.tuanzhang_delete <= #{params.tuanzhangDeleteEnd}
and tuanzhang.tuanzhang_delete = #{params.tuanzhangDelete}
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
